text: 1:10 Jenesis 19:4-5; 1 Timoti 6:3; 2 Timoti 4:3; Taitus 1:9ko arazir mɨzɨrɨzibagh amiba, ko gumazir uarira uari isava akuiba, ko gumazir gumazamiziba okɨava me gamima me pura ingangarir gumazamizibar otiviba, ko gumazamizir ifariba, ko gumazamizir kotɨn aven ifariba, merara God me bagha uan Araziba anɨngi. Egha uaghan gumazamizir Godɨn guizɨn akamɨn apaniba, God me bagha uan Araziba anɨngi.
